DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multicenter , Phase Ib dose-escalation study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics oral dose GDC-0973 GDC-0068 administered combination patient locally advance metastatic solid tumor . Cohorts patient receive multiple ascend dos GDC-0973 GDC-0068 . Anticipated time study treatment disease progression unacceptable toxicity occur .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics GDC-0973 Combination With GDC-0068 When Administered Participants With Locally Advanced Metastatic Solid Tumors
